ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Jing Wang for generating the laboratory and epidemiologic data presented in this article. We gratefully acknowledge all the members of CaliciNet China.

MS201617), and Foundation for Development of Science and Technology (grant no: CSE31N1611).
